description:
Being able to draw is such a special thing. The ability to translate your ideas, stories, and characters into reality and onto a piece of paper is very unique.

The problem, of course, is that what you imagine doesn’t always come out exactly as we expect when we start drawing.

That’s where we come in. The aim of this course is to help you bridge that gap. The gap between your intentions and ideas in your head, and what you actually see when you finish a drawing.

It is, however, not filled with tiresome fluff and padded lessons. We distill each element into bite-sized lessons that you can immediately start working on. Each lesson has a worksheet that you can use to practice the lessons.

The goal here is to give you a course that you can actually start using to learn how to draw the way you’ve always wished to do.

Here are just a few sections we cover

  • The introduction to shapes will give you a good grounding.
  • We follow this with teaching you how to draw the eyes and ears.
  • Then we move on to drawing boys and men, girls and women.
  • You will learn to pose your characters so they are appealing and interesting, as well as ready for action.
  • We uncover the secrets to creating super cute Chibi characters as well.
  • How to give your characters true emotion, to help with your story.
  • We cover difficult areas such as the hands, clothes, and hair.
  • We dive into how you can draw your own monsters and Mecha characters.
  • Learn how to color each character to give them that extra shine and personality.

In total, there are 26 videos for you in your goal of radically improving your drawings.

So what are you waiting for?

Get started Now!
title: How To Draw Manga & Anime Easily & Quickly
